sentences.en: He found a psychotherapist near him to supervise his work with a surrogate, and flew the surrogate there from Los Angeles.
sentences.cn: 他发现一名心理治疗师和一名代理在他旁边监督他的工作，并让代理从洛杉矶飞往那里。

sentences.en: For more than 20 years I have worked as a psychotherapist.
sentences.cn: 我干心理治疗师这份工作已经超过20年。

sentences.en: If none of these tricks work and you still find yourself stressed, see a professional counselor or psychotherapist.
sentences.cn: 如果这些方法都没有用，你仍然感觉到自己有压力，那就去见一个专业顾问或心理咨询师。
